docs.snippet: Don Meyer came back from a near fatal car accident and liver cancer before ending his basketball coaching career with 923 victories....
docs.lead_paragraph: Don Meyer came back from a near fatal car accident and liver cancer before ending his basketball coaching career with 923 victories.
docs.abstract: Don Meyer, widely respected college basketball coach with 923 lifetime victories, dies at age 69.

headline.main: Don Meyer, a Coach With 923 Victories, Is Dead at 69
headline.print_headline: Don Meyer, 69, a Coach With 923 Victories, Dies

docs.snippet: The sharks glided overhead while the kids below — protected by thick acrylic glass — are pointing, smiling and scrambling to take pictures of the hulking ocean predators....
docs.lead_paragraph: The sharks glided overhead while the kids below — protected by thick acrylic glass — are pointing, smiling and scrambling to take pictures of the hulking ocean predators.

headline.main: Popular Newport Aquarium in Kentucky Turns 15
headline.print_headline: Popular Newport Aquarium in Kentucky Turns 15

docs.snippet: Arlington National Cemetery's hallowed ground honors American soldiers from many different wars. But as Arlington marks its 150th anniversary this year with tours and events, historians note that its roots are firmly planted in the Civil War....
docs.lead_paragraph: Arlington National Cemetery's hallowed ground honors American soldiers from many different wars. But as Arlington marks its 150th anniversary this year with tours and events, historians note that its roots are firmly planted in the Civil War.

headline.main: Arlington Cemetery's 150 Years Rooted in Civil War
headline.print_headline: Arlington Cemetery's 150 Years Rooted in Civil War
